adjustment_policy: If any one officer consistently doesn't meet expectations, he/she will be given a warning. If nothing changes, then we will remove them from the officer team.
new_officer_application: An application process with response questions and possibly interviews will be sent out. The executive team of our club will discuss and select officers based on factors such as the application, club participation, attendance, etc.
